from SYS_USER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_USER (LOGIN_NAME, CPMPANY_MAIL, CPMPANY_ADDRESS, CPMPANY_PHONE, CPMPANY_NAME, INDUSTRY, CONTACT_MAIL, CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_NAME, STORE_NAME, DOOR_HEAD_PHOTO, CHECKOUT_COUNTER_PHOTO, BUSINESS_LICENSE_PHOTO, USER_TYPE, BUSINESS_HOURS, STATUS, PASSWORD, SALT, PWD_SET_TIME, PWD_INACTIVE_TIME, LAST_PWD, INIT_PWD_FLAG, LAST_MODIFY_BY, LAST_MODIFY_DATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, REMARKS ) values (#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpmpanyMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpmpanyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpmpanyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpmpanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contactMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doorHeadPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutCounterPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicensePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessHours,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdSetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pwdInactiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initPwdFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update SYS_USER
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOGIN_NAME = #{record.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPMPANY_MAIL = #{record.cpmpanyMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPMPANY_ADDRESS = #{record.cpmpanyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPMPANY_PHONE = #{record.cpmpanyPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CPMPANY_NAME = #{record.cpmpanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_NAME = #{record.storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

BUSINESS_LICENSE_PHOTO = #{record.businessLicensePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TYPE = #{record.userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUSINESS_HOURS = #{record.businessHours,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PASSWORD = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALT = #{record.salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PWD_SET_TIME = #{record.pwdSetTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PWD_INACTIVE_TIME = #{record.pwdInactiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_PWD = #{record.lastPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LAST_MODIFY_BY = #{record.lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATE_BY = #{record.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARKS = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
